full_summary:
====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Office Seating**

**Reference Number:** WS3960793286-Doc4027252978
**Publication Date:** 31 May 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 16 June 2023 14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contractor Entity:**

*   Government: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Regions of Delivery:** St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
**End User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

*   Name: Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16443051?extsite=MTY0NDMwNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16443051?extsite=MTY0NDMwNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador by 30 November 2023. This procurement is governed by the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) no E60PQ-120001/G and covers the following product sub-categories: fungbles chairs and stools, Product sub-category 1 - Rotary stools, and Product sub-category 2 - Side chairs. The bidding process is open to PSAB Suppliers (SA holders). Interested suppliers can contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to learn about becoming a pre-qualified SA holder.


**Important Dates:**

*   Notice Publication Date: 31 May 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: 16 June 2023, 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 28 November 2023 
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
